name: will (nivinookie)
description:
Will is a video game made for the 2021 Global Game Jam where the theme of the jam was "Lost and Found". 

Our character has lost his will to live. The climb up will be hard, you will be on your own and you will be discouraged constantly. Even though you may fall, you must remember to keep climbing out of this darkness. Recover your will to live and cleanse your body; you are not alone
